mapper.select: SELECT sights_id,sights_score,sights_eng,sights_name,sights_category,sights_image FROM sights_base WHERE sights_id IN ( SELECT i.sightsIdTwo FROM sights_base s LEFT JOIN itemcfsights i ON s.sights_id = i.sightsIdOne WHERE s.sights_id = #{sightsId} order by i.sightsScore desc ) limit 5

select sights_id,sights_score,sights_eng,sights_name,sights_category,sights_image from sights_base where sights_id in ( select i.sightsId from sights_base s left join onlinerecs i on s.sights_id = i.sightsId where i.userId = #{userId} order by i.sightsScore desc ) limit 5
